name: easygenerator-plugins
description: Collection of plugins to extend easygenerator templates functionality

scripts.resources: lokalise2 file download --unzip-to ./src/localization --directory-prefix lang --config ./localise.config.yml --format json --all-platforms true --export-sort first_added --indentation 4sp --json-unescaped-slashes true --add-newline-eof true --export-empty-as base --replace-breaks=false --language-mapping '[{"original_language_iso": "zh-CN","custom_language_iso": "cn"}, {"original_language_iso": "uk","custom_language_iso": "ua"}, {"original_language_iso": "nb_NO","custom_language_iso": "nb-no"}, {"original_language_iso": "nn_NO","custom_language_iso": "nn-no"}, {"original_language_iso": "pt-BR","custom_language_iso": "pt-br"}]'
